speaker: President.
english: President. Mr Pęk, you had one minute speaking time. You spoke for one minute and 23 seconds. You exceeded your time, and the President was very tolerant. Perhaps you could be reasonable and accept that.
original: President. Mr Pęk, you had one minute speaking time. You spoke for one minute and 23 seconds. You exceeded your time, and the President was very tolerant. Perhaps you could be reasonable and accept that.
agenda_item: Convening of the Intergovernmental Conference: opinion of the European Parliament (debate)
